Welcome to hall decoder
h: print this help menu
t: toggle printing tachometer
d: go forward and backwards in various configurations
r: make a full revolution (quickly)
R: make a full revolution (full test)
q: do a quick test to detect discrete hall order
Q: do a quick test to detect continuous hall order
